attributes.action: All MP's who voted to remain to have their seats re-run.
attributes.additional_details:
MP's are blatantly blocking democracy like spoilt children who do not get their own way.
All politicians need a sharp reminder that you are voted for by the people to do as the people ask - if there is going to be no democracy then you can no longer make the laws for us to live by.
Seats need to be contested by leavers and remainers - if not possible then vs people not getting back handers like the current politicians.
You have a job - DO IT OR RESIGN
attributes.background:
MP's are blocking brexit for their own selfish needs - even those whose constituents who voted to LEAVE.
This is an unacceptable abuse of power by those voted to do the will of the people.
So all blocking Remainers MUST have their seats re-run - esp. those in seats that voted to leave.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
